Staff

Editor's Note

by Zhiqiao (Kate) Jiang

I, Too, Am a Riddle [प्रिय! मैं हूँ एक पहेली भी]

written by Mahadevi Varma
translated from Hindi by Anjali Gupta

YOU DON’T RAISE CHILDREN TO WATCH THEM DIE [NO SE CRÍAN HIJOS PARA VERLOS MORIR]

written by Rosabetty Muñoz
translated from Spanish by Claudia Nuñez de Ibieta

Unwavering [Manteniéndome firme]

written by Zoraida Armengol
translated from Spanish by Pablo Abrante

Whispered [Tiše]

written by František Halas
translated from Czech by Kathryn Dettmer

Certitude [Jistota]

written by František Halas
translated from Czech by Kathryn Dettmer

I Have Seen (Ikh Hob Gezen) [איך האָבּ געזען]

written by Zusman Segalovitsh
translated from Yiddish by Betsy Morgan

Extinguish the Sun (Farlesh Di Zun) [פאַרלעש די זון]

written by Zusman Segalovitsh
translated from Yiddish by Betsy Morgan

The Vultures [Les vautours]

written by David Diop
translated from French by Samantha DeStefano

finch [雀]

written by Zhang Ergun
translated from Chinese by Kejia Wang

Morituri [Morituri]

written by Adolf Brand
translated from German by Robert Chen

Kaise Kahoon / How Do I Say?

by Simran Chand

Reaching for Words on Gottschee

by Quinn Gruber

Zinka [Зинка]

written by Yuliya Drunina
translated from Russian by Maya Shumyatcher

Phra Aphai Mani [พระอภัยมณี]

written by Sunthorn Phu
translated from Thai by Peeriya Pongsarigun; John Viano

Whole of Spring [La primavera entera]

written by Idea Vilariño
translated from Spanish by Maria Lourdes Riillo

Alcohols: 1909 [Alcools: 1909]

written by Guillaume Apollinaire
translated from French by Saagar Asnani

Mother [Anne]

written by Sirin Parkan
translated from Turkish by Emre Azizlerli

Three poems

written by Stella N’Djoku
translated from Italian by Julia Pelosi-Thorpe

The universe blames me [تلومني الدنيا]

written by Nizar Qabbani
translated from Arabic by Michael Karam

Epilogue II to "Requiem" [Реквием. Эпилог II]

written by Anna Akhmatova
translated from Russian by Ryan Hardy

The Romantic Dogs [Los perros románticos]

written by Roberto Bolaño
translated from by DoubleSpeak Staff; Andrea Conde; Chardonnay Needler; Ziang (Arthur) Wei; Ryan Hardy; Daniel Shevchenko
